Do you want to give your own accountcode, if yes, then suggested code will be available
\n1.Aakash Business Tool welcome page: \n Here the user can create a new organization or select an existing one.

2.Create new organization: 
 When the user clicks on Create new organization button on the main page, 
 it will call the Create new organization page.

3.Select organization: 
 When the user clicks on Select existing organization button, 
 it will call the select organization page.

\n4.Fill organization details: \n After the user fills organization details, he can save the information by clicking on the Save button. if the user does not want to fill the information, he can simply click the Skip button.
\n5.Preferences: \n User can add new projects and check the Account code using the check-box,if a manual account code has to be provided.

\n6.Create account: \n User can create an account under respective Group name and Subgroup name with an opening balance. This will automatically update the total debit opening balance, total credit opening balance and difference between them.
\n7.Master menu: \n This is the master menu of Aakash Business Tool. Here, user can create/search account, enter/search transaction, view reports(ledger and trial balance) and add more projects.

\n8.Enter transaction: \n This page allows the user to enter and search transactions(see below figure [a] and [c])) . Home button will take the user to the master menu page(see figure [b]). Search botton will help to locate a transaction by the voucher reference number, date and narration(see figure [d]).

\n9.Reports Menu: \n This page provides a list of all report types. After the user clicks on Report type, he will get an alert dialog, which will allow him to enter necessary details in order to view the report. For Example: Ledger(see figure [e]) , Trial Balance(see figure [f]) and so on.
